description:
New downloadable content (Party Hustle Pack) is coming to Party Party Time 2!
Enjoy a mix of 10 all new competitive and co-op minigames!
Get the gang together and get ready to hustle!

The "Party Hustle Pack" includes the following content:
10 New Minigames:
6 Competitive Games
- Surprise Box
- Balloon Archer
- Sniper
- Farm Battle
- Ball Catcher
- Knock Down Ball
4 Co-op Games
- Spelling Scramble
- Ghost Fight
- Jet Ski Together
- Hot Air Balloon
name: Party Hustle Pack
